titles.title: Federal Aviation Employees Protection Act of 2011
To pay personnel compensation and benefits for employees of the Federal Aviation Administration.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Transportation and Infrastructure
Referred to House Ways and Means
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: 8/1/2011--Introduced. Federal Aviation Employees Protection Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make amounts in the Airport and Airway Trust Fund available to pay personnel compensation and benefits for Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) employees funded from appropriations or authorizations provided on or before July 22, 2011.
